    • Method Detail

      • getManager

        public static ArenaManager getManager()
        Gets the instance of ArenaManager.
        Returns:
        The instance of the ArenaManager.

      • arenaLoaded

        public java.lang.Boolean arenaLoaded(int i)
        Checks if the arena is loaded.
        Parameters:
        i - The ID of the arena to check.
        Returns:
        true if loaded, else false.

      • isInGame

        public java.lang.Boolean isInGame(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the player is in a game. Use isSpectating(Player) to check if a player is spectating a game.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        Returns:
        true if in a game, else false.

      • isSpectating

        public java.lang.Boolean isSpectating(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the player is spectating a game. Use isInGame(Player) to check if a player is in a game.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        Returns:
        true if spectating, else false.

      • getArena

        public Arena getArena(int id)
        Gets the arena with the specified ID. You should check if this exists first with arenaLoaded(int) or you may get null.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the arena.
        Returns:
        The Arena requested.

      • getArena

        public Arena getArena(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Gets the arena with the specified player, whether playing or spectating. You should check if the player is in a game with isInGame(Player) or spectating with isSpectating(Player) to avoid a null return.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to get.
        Returns:
        The arena containing the specified player.

      • getAllLoadedArenas

        public java.util.ArrayList<Arena> getAllLoadedArenas()
        Gets a list of all arenas currently loaded. Please use wisely as this can cause issues if you change the set!
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all loaded arenas.

      • loadArena

        public java.lang.Boolean loadArena(Arena arena)
        Called when loading an arena, often from another plugin. This will call the ArenaLoadEvent event. If not cancelled, will mark the specified arena as loaded. This will NOT mark any actual arena data!!!! YOU MUST SET THAT YOURSELF!!!
        Parameters:
        arena - The arena to mark as loaded.
        Returns:
        true if not cancelled and successful, else false.

      • loadArena

        public java.lang.Boolean loadArena(int id,
                          java.lang.String gameName,
                          java.lang.Boolean useTeams)
        Called when loading an arena. This will call the ArenaLoadEvent event. If not cancelled, this will either load the arena from scratch, or copy the arena from the event.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena to load.
        Returns:
        true if not cancelled and successful, else false.

      • unloadArena

        public java.lang.Boolean unloadArena(Arena arena)
        Called when unloading an arena, often from another plugin. This will call the ArenaUnloadEvent event. If not cancelled, will mark the specified arena as unloaded. This will NOT mark any actual arena data!!!! YOU MUST SET THAT YOURSELF!!!
        Parameters:
        arena - The arena to mark as unloaded.
        Returns:
        true if not cancelled and successful, else false.

      • unloadArena

        public java.lang.Boolean unloadArena(int id)
        Called when unloading an arena. This will call the ArenaUnloadEvent event. If not cancelled, this will either unload the arena, or copy the arena from the event.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena to unload.
        Returns:
        true if not cancelled and successful, else false.

      • reloadArena

        public java.lang.Boolean reloadArena(int id)
        Called when reloading an arena. This will call the ArenaReloadEvent event. If not cancelled, this will reload the arena.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena to reload.
        Returns:
        true if not cancelled and successful, else false.
